result.execSummary:
Michael Anthony Stephenson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael Anthony Stephenson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Anthony Stephenson

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michael Anthony Stephenson
Current: 15865 Guard Street Apt 123, Hayward, WI 54843   (Effective: 03-10-2022)
Prior: 15865 Guard Street, Hayward, WI 54843

02:07 PM Defendant Michael Anthony Stephenson in court, in custody, appearing by video from Sawyer County Jail, Pro Se.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances.  DEF agrees that he is the person the state of Minnesota is looking for.  Court reviews extradition, regarding warrant from state of Minnesota.  Court has discussion with DEF regarding attorney, DEF to proceed without an attorney, Court proceeds.   DEF wishes to waive extradition.  Court addresses DEF advising him of his right to waive or contest extradition.  DEF responds.  DEF waives extradition, Court witnesses DEF signing extradition form via video.  Court certifies that DEF was informed of his rights and that DEF has freely and voluntarily waived his right of extradition.
